name: Pixel Bender Graph File
summary: Learn about .PBG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: PBG files are saved in an XML format. The source code segments are wrapped by CDATA tags so that the file preserves both the source code and XML formatting.
NOTE: Pixel Bender kernel files use the .PBK extension. PBG files do not contain PBK files, but they contain the plain text kernel source code.

description: File created by Pixel Bender Toolkit, a program used for creating image manipulation filters for programs such as Photoshop, Flash Player, and After Effects; contains a processing graph that includes multiple Pixel Bender kernels (image filters); allows developers to connect multiple kernels into a single processing unit.
